mainEntity.name: What are the moving charges near me in UP?

acceptedAnswer.text: Local moving charges near you start from ₹3,000 for 1BHK, ₹4,500 for 2BHK, and ₹6,000 for 3BHK homes. Final cost depends on items quantity, floor level, and specific requirements. We offer transparent pricing with no hidden charges.
